title: Master the Essentials
description: Dive into the core trio of web development—HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Build a solid foundation by mastering these fundamental technologies to create dynamic, visually appealing websites.

title: Framework Frenzy
description: Accelerate your development process by learning a popular JavaScript framework. Harness the power of tools like React, Vue, or Angular to streamline your workflows and build efficient, scalable applications.

title: Code Savvy
description: Enhance your coding prowess by reading documentation and integrating others’ code into your projects. This will help you understand best practices, explore new techniques, and improve your problem-solving skills.

title: Collaboration Mastery
description: Join forces with others in real-world scenarios using Git. Learn to manage version control, collaborate effectively, and contribute to team projects to simulate a production environment.

title: Showcase Your Skills
description: Build a compelling portfolio to demonstrate your expertise. Create impressive projects that reflect your capabilities and attract potential employers or clients. Your proof of work is your ticket to success!
